casebody.data:
In re Robert C.* (9134)

Dupont, C. J., Daly and Heiman, Js.

Argued February 5 decision released February 26, 1991 Kent Drager, assistant public defender, with whom, on the brief, was G. Douglas Nash, public defender, for the appellant (respondent). Joseph J. Kristan, Jr., state’s advocate, for the appellee (petitioner).

In accordance with the spirit and intent of General Statutes § 46b-142 (b) and Practice Book § 2026, the names of the parties involved in this appeal are not disclosed. The records and papers of this case shall be open for inspection only to persons having a proper interest therein and upon order of the Appellate Court.

 Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
